title: Just updated the newest patch and i got into a game with increased ping
body:
I started up league last night prior to the patch and nothing was wrong but today when i logged on I got 120 ping instead of my normal 40ish. In the game was another NZ player who was having the exact same problem. Can anyone help here?
Just asked a friend to test his game. He was from the south island to my north and same issue this seems to be NZ wide

replies.body: Chrischurch here, its soooo painful, please fix NZ server
playing from auckland nz, normally got 20-30 now just got over 200
bump, from NZ too. constant 170 ping where as i usually play on around 50-60. Has Riot even acknowledged this as a problem?
bump. playing from nz here too. 150 extra on top of my normal ping
can riots fix the servers pls and put it on the servers status, it sooo annoying
yip. I'm playing at 190ping compared to 34 normal. Auckland
its been whole day now OMG
same all my NZ friends are experiencing 150 more ping than nromal
like could any1 fix it. its so horrible, and no one notice it
Seems to be fixed for me now
Surely if we submit enough tickets someone will notice...
120 ping for me, about 4 other people in my game were experiencing it also, dont see anything about it on service status or red tracker idk. feelsbadman
